entity1.name: Bermuda Triangle
entity1.description: A loosely defined region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean associated with numerous disappearances of aircraft and ships.;;;A region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean, also known as the Bermuda Triangle, where a number of aircraft and ships are said to have disappeared under mysterious circumstances.;;;An alternative name for the Bermuda Triangle, emphasizing its mysterious and dangerous reputation.;;;The body of water in which the Bermuda Triangle is located, specifically in its western part.;;;A region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean where ships and aircraft are said to disappear under mysterious circumstances.;;;A region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean where ships and aircraft are said to have disappeared under mysterious circumstances.;;;A region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean where ships and aircraft have reportedly disappeared under mysterious circumstances.
